query-scheme.name: mdProjectSchemeSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT ID, NAME, CODE, IS_SCHEME, SEQUENCE FROM MD_PROJECT_SCHEME WHERE IS_SCHEME = 1 AND STATUS = 1

query-scheme.name: mdProjectSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT PROJECT_ID, NAME, CODE, PARENT_ID, BRANCH_ORG_ID, PROJECT_ORG_ID, FULL_ID, SEQUENCE FROM MD_PROJECT WHERE RESOURCE_KIND_ID = 'project'

query-scheme.name: mdProjectSelectByBranchOrgId
query-scheme.desc: 选择某个公司下的项目
query-scheme.sql: SELECT PROJECT_ID, NAME, CODE, PARENT_ID, BRANCH_ORG_ID, PROJECT_ORG_ID, FULL_ID, SEQUENCE FROM MD_PROJECT WHERE RESOURCE_KIND_ID = 'project' and BRANCH_ORG_ID = :branchOrgId

query-scheme.name: mdProjectStageSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT PROJECT_ID, NAME, CODE, PARENT_ID, BRANCH_ORG_ID, PROJECT_ORG_ID, FULL_ID, SEQUENCE FROM MD_PROJECT WHERE PARENT_ID = :projectId

query-scheme.name: mdNewProjectOrganSelect
query-scheme.sql: select ID, PROJECT_ID, STAGE_ID, PARENT_ID, NAME, CODE, ORG_ID, IS_MAIN_ORG, ORG_KIND_ID, FULL_ID, MD_FULL_NAME, RESOURCE_KIND_ID, PROJECT_ORG_ID, BRANCH_ORG_ID, project_phase_id, scheme_id, area, organ_md_full_name, stage_logo_id from V_MD_PROJECT_ORGAN_NEW where 1=1 and (RESOURCE_KIND_ID is null or RESOURCE_KIND_ID = :resourceKindId) and (IS_MAIN_ORG is null or IS_MAIN_ORG=:isMainOrg) and (IS_PUBLIC is null or IS_PUBLIC=0 or IS_PUBLIC=:isPublic) order by NAME ASC

query-scheme.name: mdProjectResourceSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT ID, NAME, CODE, RESOURCE_KIND_ID, BEGIN_STATUS, MD_FULL_NAME, PROJECT_ORG_ID, BRANCH_ORG_ID, FULL_ID, SEQUENCE FROM V_MD_PROJECT_RESOURCES where 1=1

query-scheme.name: mdResourceOrgQuery
query-scheme.sql: select v.id, v.project_id, v.name, v.full_id, v.full_sequence, v.kind_name from (select o.id, null as project_id, o.name, o.full_id, o.full_sequence, '公司' as kind_name from sa_oporg o where exists (select 0 from md_project p where p.resource_kind_id = 'project' and p.branch_org_id = o.id) and o.org_kind_id = 'ogn' and o.status = 1 union all select o.id, t.project_id, t.name, o.full_id, o.full_sequence || '/' || lpad(t.sequence, 4, '0') as full_sequence, '项目' as kind_name from MD_PROJECT t, sa_oporg o where t.resource_kind_id = 'project' and t.branch_org_id = o.id) v where 1 = 1

query-scheme.name: mdResourceSelectByTree
query-scheme.sql: select id, name, code, parent_id, resource_kind_id, begin_status, md_full_name, project_org_id, branch_org_id, full_id, customer_name, decode(resource_kind_id, 'project', 10000, 'stage', 100000, 'building', 1000000, 'floor', 10000000, 'room', 100000000, 0) + nvl(sequence, 1000) as sequence, md_full_name as cascadeField from v_md_project_resources where 1 = 1

query-scheme.name: mdMaterialSelect
query-scheme.sql: select material_id, node_kind_id, create_by_id, create_by_name, create_by_time, update_by_id, update_by_name, update_by_time, remark, sequence, name, code, specification, effective_days, remind_days, parent_id from md_material where 1 = 1

query-scheme.name: mdRealMaterialSelect
query-scheme.sql: select material_id, node_kind_id, create_by_id, create_by_name, create_by_time, update_by_id, update_by_name, update_by_time, remark, sequence, name, code, specification, effective_days, remind_days, parent_id from md_material WHERE NODE_KIND_ID = 2

query-scheme.name: mdStageSchemeSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT STAGE_ID, NAME STAGE_NAME, CODE,sequence FROM MD_STAGE_SCHEME WHERE PROJECT_ID = :projectId AND SCHEME_ID = :schemeId

query-scheme.name: mdApartmentSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT ROOM_CODE, ROOM_MODEL,SEQUENCE FROM MD_APARTMENT_SCHEME WHERE PROJECT_ID = :projectId AND SCHEME_ID = :schemeId AND STAGE_ID = :stageId

query-scheme.name: mdApprovedSingleProjectContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 选择已通过审核的单项目合同
query-scheme.sql: SELECT mdContract.CONTRACT_ID, mdContract.NAME, mdContract.CODE, mdContract.Party_B_Name, mdContract.Party_B_Id, mdContract.ORGAN_ID, mdContract.MANAGE_ORGAN_ID, mdContract.FULL_ID, (SELECT string_agg(stage_id) FROM Md_Contract_Project WHERE CONTRACT_ID = mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) stage_ids, (SELECT DISTINCT string_agg(DISTINCT project_id) FROM Md_Contract_Project WHERE CONTRACT_ID = mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) project_ids, (SELECT DISTINCT string_agg(DISTINCT p.Name) FROM Md_Contract_Project c,MD_PROJECT p WHERE c.CONTRACT_ID = mdContract.CONTRACT_ID AND p.project_id=c.project_id) project_names FROM MD_CONTRACT mdContract WHERE STATUS = 3 AND 1= (SELECT DISTINCT NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT project_id),0) FROM Md_Contract_Project WHERE CONTRACT_ID = mdContract.CONTRACT_ID)

query-scheme.name: mdApprovedContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 选择已通过审核的合同
query-scheme.sql: SELECT mdContract.CONTRACT_ID, mdContract.NAME, mdContract.CODE, mdContract.Party_B_Name, mdContract.Party_B_Id, mdContract.ORGAN_ID, mdContract.MANAGE_ORGAN_ID, mdContract.FULL_ID, (SELECT string_agg(stage_id) FROM Md_Contract_Project WHERE CONTRACT_ID = mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) stage_ids FROM MD_CONTRACT mdContract WHERE STATUS = 3

query-scheme.name: mdPlanApprovedContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 选择是合约规划的已通过审核的合同
query-scheme.sql: SELECT mdContract.CONTRACT_ID, mdContract.NAME, mdContract.CODE, mdContract.Party_B_Name, mdContract.Party_B_Id, mdContract.ORGAN_ID, mdContract.MANAGE_ORGAN_ID, mdContract.FULL_ID, (SELECT string_agg(stage_id) FROM Md_Contract_Project WHERE CONTRACT_ID=mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) stage_ids FROM MD_CONTRACT mdContract WHERE STATUS=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CM_PROJECT_CONTRACT_PLAN WHERE contract_id= mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) ORDER BY mdContract.CONTRACT_ID DESC

query-scheme.name: mdMetricApprovedContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 选择是指标的已通过审核的合同
query-scheme.sql: SELECT mdContract.CONTRACT_ID, mdContract.NAME, mdContract.CODE, mdContract.Party_B_Name, mdContract.Party_B_Id, mdContract.ORGAN_ID, mdContract.MANAGE_ORGAN_ID, mdContract.FULL_ID, (SELECT string_agg(stage_id) FROM Md_Contract_Project WHERE CONTRACT_ID=mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) stage_ids FROM MD_CONTRACT mdContract WHERE STATUS=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CM_STOCK_SUBJECT_METRIC WHERE contract_id= mdContract.CONTRACT_ID) ORDER BY mdContract.CONTRACT_ID DESC

query-scheme.name: mdOnlyApprovedContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 选择已通过审核的合同(不包括补充协议)
query-scheme.sql: SELECT CONTRACT_ID, NAME, CODE, Party_A_NAME, Party_A_Id, MANAGE_ORGAN_ID, Party_A_Siger, Party_B_NAME, Party_B_Id, Party_B_Siger, Party_C, Party_C_Id, Party_C_Siger, purchase_plan_id, total_amount FROM MD_CONTRACT WHERE STATUS = 3 and property_id in (1, 2)

query-scheme.name: costBillContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 造价清单中能够选择的合同列表
query-scheme.sql: SELECT CONTRACT_ID, NAME, CODE, Party_B_NAME, Party_B_Id FROM MD_CONTRACT a WHERE STATUS = 3 and property_id in (1, 2) and not exists (select 1 from cm_contract_cost_bill_inst b where is_valid = 1 and kind_id = :kindId and a.contract_id = b.contract_id)

query-scheme.name: totalPriceCostBillContractSelect
query-scheme.desc: 总价形成造价清单中能够选择的合同列表
query-scheme.sql: SELECT CONTRACT_ID, NAME, CODE, Party_B_NAME, Party_B_Id FROM MD_CONTRACT a WHERE STATUS = 3 and property_id in (1, 2) and not exists (select 1 from cm_contract_cost_bill_inst b where is_valid = 1 and version_type = :versionType and kind_id = '3' and a.contract_id = b.contract_id)

query-scheme.name: mdContractKindSelect
query-scheme.sql: SELECT CONTRACT_KIND_ID, NAME, CODE, CHANGE_WARNING_RATIO, PAYMENT_WARNING_RADIO, PARENT_ID, KIND, SEQUENCE FROM MD_CONTRACT_KIND T WHERE T.STATUS = 1 AND T.PARENT_ID IN (SELECT CONTRACT_KIND_ID FROM MD_CONTRACT_KIND T WHERE T.CODE = :parentCode)

query-scheme.name: mdNewStageSelect
query-scheme.sql: select ID, name, CODE, RESOURCE_KIND_ID, PARENT_ID, STAGE_ID, PROJECT_ID, STAGE_LOGO_ID, MD_FULL_NAME, BRANCH_ORG_ID, PROJECT_ORG_ID, FULL_ID, SCHEME_ID, PROJECT_PHASE_ID, SEQUENCE from V_MD_NEW_STAGE_RESOURCES V where v.RESOURCE_KIND_ID = 'stage' order by PROJECT_ID, V.SEQUENCE

query-scheme.name: mdNewStageSelectLimit
query-scheme.sql: select ID, name, CODE, RESOURCE_KIND_ID, PARENT_ID, STAGE_ID, PROJECT_ID, STAGE_LOGO_ID, MD_FULL_NAME, BRANCH_ORG_ID, PROJECT_ORG_ID, FULL_ID, SCHEME_ID, PROJECT_PHASE_ID, SEQUENCE from V_MD_NEW_STAGE_RESOURCES V where v.RESOURCE_KIND_ID = 'stage' AND STAGE_ID IN (SELECT (REGEXP_SUBSTR(:stageIds,'[^,]+',1,rownum)) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH(:stageIds) - LENGTH(REPLACE(:stageIds,',','')) + 1) order by PROJECT_ID, V.SEQUENCE
